Improve this doc View source

storeService
service in module app

Description

storeService

A factory that allows easy access to the encrypted session in local storage.

Methods

  • decrypt(str)

    Decrypts a string.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    strString
    • Input an encrypted string to convert it to an object.
    Returns
    Object

    An object.

  • encrypt(obj)

    Encrypts an object.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    objObject
    • Input an object to convert it to an encrypted string.
    Returns
    String

    An encrypted string.

  • get([str])

    Gets the saved session from local storage, decrypts it and returns the object. An optional string can be passed in to return a specific value from the session.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    [str]String
    • Optional, input the key for the value you want fetch from local storage.
    Returns
    Object

    Returns the decrypted session or the requested value from local storage.

  • remove()

    Removes all saved local storage.

  • set(obj)

    Saves an object as an encrypted session in local storage.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    objObject
    • Input the object you want set as your session in local storage.
